messages.message:
Hey team, I wanted to start a discuss on implementing delete protection on cloud resources as a security compliance. I have created a document, it will be great to have a feedback on the approach.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1k8mLdzZ0NQvc6poanF5w0bmrHphYDNVz68qEA3hKTtI/edit?usp=sharing
cc: @jayapandian.ponraj @Cody Boggs @Abhinav
Nice! Thanks for the write-up, left a couple comments but nothing breaking. :slightly_smiling_face:
